TopicTitle: Gathering Information from Satellites and probes.

Articles.Content:
I suggest that satellites and probes, should give us more detailed information about planets or celestial bodies.

For example: If you deploy a satellite on Kerbin orbit, the tracking station will be able to give us a detailed map of its surface, giving us an idea of the types of bioms there, and more detailed information such as type of atmosphere, geological activity, temperature, etc.

All regards.
